argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lkrcl.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lkrcl.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lkrcl.k | |- K = ( LKer ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5, 2, 3 | #P_ellkr | |- ( ( W e. Y /\ G e. F ) -> ( X e. ( K ` G ) <-> ( X e. V /\ ( G ` X ) = ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simprbda | |- ( ( ( W e. Y /\ G e. F ) /\ X e. ( K ` G ) ) -> X e. V ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3impa | |- ( ( W e. Y /\ G e. F /\ X e. ( K ` G ) ) -> X e. V ) |
